00006 State AbstractRK4Integrator::evaluate(
00007                                         const State &_initial,
00008                                         float _t
00009                                         )
00010 {
00011 
00012   State output;
00013   output.m_position=_initial.m_velocity;
00014   output.m_velocity=motionFunction(_initial, _t);
00015   return output;

00017 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00018 State AbstractRK4Integrator::evaluate(
00019                                     const State &_initial,
00020                                     float _t,
00021                                     float _dt,
00022                                     const State &_d
00023                                      )
00024 {
00025 
00026   State state;
00027   state.m_position = _initial.m_position + _d.m_position*_dt;
00028   state.m_velocity = _initial.m_velocity + _d.m_velocity*_dt;
00029   State output;
00030   output.m_position = state.m_velocity;
00031   output.m_velocity = motionFunction(state, _t+_dt);
00032   return output;
00033 }
00034 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00035 void AbstractRK4Integrator::integrate(
00036                                         float _t,
00037                                         float _dt
00038                                         )
00039 {
00040   // basic RK4 integration we calculate the initial value then two slopes
00041   // and combine together see
00042   // http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Runge%E2%80%93Kutta_methods for more details
00043   State a = evaluate(m_state, _t);
00044   State b = evaluate(m_state, _t, _dt*0.5f, a);
00045   State c = evaluate(m_state, _t, _dt*0.5f, b);
00046   State d = evaluate(m_state, _t, _dt, c);
00047   const ngl::Vec3 dxdt = 1.0f/6.0f * (a.m_position + 2.0f*(b.m_position + c.m_position) + d.m_position);
00048   const ngl::Vec3 dvdt = 1.0f/6.0f * (a.m_velocity + 2.0f*(b.m_velocity + c.m_velocity) + d.m_velocity);
00049 
00050   m_state.m_position = m_state.m_position + dxdt*_dt;
00051   m_state.m_velocity = m_state.m_velocity + dvdt*_dt;
00052     //std::cout<<"\n integate val: pos="<<m_state.m_position<<" vel = "<<m_state.m_velocity;
00053 }
